title: What newspapers have interesting histories? - Quora

response.answer_text: I speak for America and with due deference to other outstanding newspapers. Reading the NY Times will give you as good a formal education as a four-year college Liberal arts education! There is no aspect of everything from investigative journalism, to finance, to politics, current events, lifestyle, and the arts, crosswords, they do not cover comprehensively and in serious depth! You will save a fortune, but of course, will not get that famous “college experience”! lol
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Julian Alexander Lopez

response.answer_text: Any around long enough to have a history will have interesting information about it. You just have to read the archives.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Julian Alexander Lopez
